summary: A successful aging dancer takes a young female protegee.
cast: Mikhail Baryshnikov|Alessandra Ferri|Leslie Browne|Tommy Rall|Lynn Seymour|Victor Barbee|Julie Kent|Mariangela Melato|Leandro Amato|Gianmarco Tognazzi|Desmond Kelly|Chrisa Keramidas|Amy Werba|Jack Brodsky|Robert Argand|Amanda McKerrow|Bonnie Moore
title: Dancers
